name: T.R.I.S.
description:
You, as T.R.I.S., will have to travel through planets, gathering water drops to buy your partners' freedom.

Be wary of enemies, traps, screen borders... ahem.

Be wary, that's all!

Controls:

  • LEFT & RIGHT to move.
  • UP/W & DOWN/S to change gravity direction.
  • R to return to the last checkpoint.
  • T to travel to the start of the level.

OST by Oliver Martín de la Llama

Made for: #GBJAM5
